actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the United States to pay for certain lateral sewer connections for low-income elderly persons.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the United States to pay the entire cost of lateral sewer connections between federally-assisted collection systems and single-family residences of low-income elderly persons age 65 or older.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the United States to pay for certain lateral sewer connections for low-income elderly persons.
